Description:
Detects PowerShell command line contents that include a suspicious abnormal casing in the Net.Webclient (e.g. nEt.WEbCliEnT) string as used in obfuscation techniques

Author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Net WebClient Casing Anomalies
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where (((process_path like '%\powershell.exe' or process_path like '%\pwsh.exe') and (original_file_name = 'powershell.exe' or original_file_name = 'pwsh.dll')) and (command like '%tgblafqalgb3aeuaqg%' or command like '%4azqbuac4adwbfaeia%' or command like '%oaguavaauahcarqbca%' or command like '%bgbfahqalgb3aguayg%' or command like '%4arqb0ac4adwblagia%' or command like '%uaeuadaauahcazqbia%' or command like '%tgbfahqalgb3aguayg%' or command like '%oaeuadaauahcazqbia%' or command like '%bgblafqalgb3aguayg%' or command like '%4azqbuac4adwblagia%' or command like '%uaguavaauahcazqbia%' or command like '%tgblafqalgb3aguayg%' or command like '%oaguavaauahcazqbia%' or command like '%bgbfafqalgb3aguayg%' or command like '%4arqbuac4adwblagia%' or command like '%uaeuavaauahcazqbia%' or command like '%bgblahqalgbxaguayg%' or command like '%4azqb0ac4avwblagia%' or command like '%uaguadaauafcazqbia%' or
